item.title: Help Making a ::changeusername Command [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @reventix reventix
item.description:
@reventix wrote:

hey guys, im trying to make a ::changeusername command but i keep getting an error:

client.java:9566: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerUserName location: class client playerUserName = command.substring(15); 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

and this is the command code i am using:

if (command.startsWith("changeusername") && command.length() > 15) { playerUserName = command.substring(15); sM("Your new User is \""+command.substring(15)+"\""); }

i have basicly just copied the ::changepassword command, but that dont seem to work, can someone please help me and tell me why it isnt working?

thanks.

Read full topic
